name: FileNotFoundError
defaultMessage: The requested file could not be found
defaultExplanation: The file could not be found
defaultResponse: Verify the file exists and retry the operation

name: FolderNotFoundError
defaultMessage: The requested folder could not be found
defaultExplanation: The folder could not be found
defaultResponse: Verify the folder exists and retry the operation

name: FolderRemoveError
defaultMessage: The requested folder could not be deleted
defaultExplanation: The folder could not be found
defaultResponse: Verify the folder exists and retry the operation

name: FolderHasError
defaultMessage: The requested folder could not be deleted
defaultExplanation: The folder contains files or folders
defaultResponse: Please delete all files or folders within

name: UploadHasError
defaultMessage: The upload operation failed with errors.
defaultExplanation: An error occured during the file upload.
defaultResponse: Error has been logged and Admin notified

name: OperationFailed
defaultExplanation: An error occured during the file operation.
defaultResponse: Error has been logged and Admin notified

name: OperationHasErrors
defaultExplanation: Errors occured during this file operation.
defaultResponse: Errors have been logged and Admin notified

name: ClientIdError
defaultMessage: This action is not allowed. We can not understand your request.
defaultResponse: Error has been logged and Admin notified

name: S3UploadHasError
defaultMessage: The upload operation failed with errors.
defaultExplanation: An error occured during the AWS S3 file upload.
defaultResponse: Error has been logged and Admin notified

name: CriticalServerError
defaultMessage: iXit could not complete this request because it had a major internal error.
defaultExplanation: Rarely things go wrong here. We are probably aware of this and will have it fixed as soon as possible.
defaultResponse: Error has been logged and Admin notified
